biotools.summary: STAMP (Sequence Tag-based Analysis of Microbial Populations) is a tool for the introduction of allelic diversity into otherwise identical bacteria using DNA barcodes enables sequencing-based measurements of these parameters. STAMPR is a successor to STAMP, which accounts for such population expansions.

bioschemas.name: STAMPR
